attributes.action: Calculate child maintenance payments after tax not before.
attributes.additional_details: Taking into account the tax hike this makes the standard of living for the paying parent very difficult and also makes it a struggle to treat and care for the children when the paying parent has them. If taken from net wages this then achieves a better living scenario for the children and both parents due to a less stressful environment and creates a better environment between parents also.
attributes.background: With the new tax increases it is making it more difficult for paying parents to afford child maintenance payments while affording to care for the children when the paying parent has the children. Currently it is calculated from gross pay with new tax increases this gives parents less money to live.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700259
